They have way more that just that’ I go here at least once every 2 weeks to look at the new merchandise and chat with the VERY friendly staff.

If you have any suggestions for additional product please let us know! Hope we can assist you in the future.

Me and my girl have made Enchantasys a regular part of our dating routine. We will often go in just to wander and let our minds do the rest. Enchantasys is a wonderful destination for everyone from seasoned kinksters to the blushing newbies.

text: Staff member forced me and my lady to wear masks, believe her name was MJ , while not wearing hers or making other customers wear a mask. I was told I wasn't going to be allowed to enter without mask yet the employee herself wasn't wearing hers nor were other customers forced as we were. Hypocrisy at its finest.

resp.text: Meemaw, we sincerely apologies for this incident. Our policy is to follow current government mandates and require that everyone in the store wears masks. If staff was not complying and enforcing this policy selectively we will be sure to look into it and make the necessary changes. I can assure you this will not happen again. Once again I'm sorry for your experience and thank you for the feedback, we hope you will give us another chance.

text: Prices are cheap in comparison to the surrounding areas. The staff is always there to help. Very clean always. name: Melissa Carter
text: OMG. I went to this store with one goal, a new toy that was blue tooth and would work with my music. Only problem, the clerk was not knowledgeable about the product or was just trying to make a sell. I purchased the Jive by We-Vibe. Not a bad product but the wrong product. So if they tell you this particular product works with your music, LIES. I paid $160 for it and you can get it on the We-Vibe site for $120, bc it doesn’t work with music. And of course you can’t return it. I think I deserve to have what I asked the clerk for.

My husband just took me to this store last night. They have a great variety of items and the store is very clean and well kept. The people there are nice, open, and willing to answer any questions you have about any of their products.

I myself was looking for a natural lubrication because my skin is sensitive and most natural selections are sticky and you don't have many options, they had a good amount of options to pick from in the natural lubrication section and even asked a few questions that would help them find exactly what I was looking for.

I definitely plan on purchasing from x-mart again because of this experience.

name: Angelina Tucker
text: I was very disappointed that’s all I can say. I went into Spencer’s looking for shirts that I desperately needed and I bought five that I absolutely loved. When I got home and tried them on, the inside of the shirts were a disgusting and cheap material that I could not stand. I decided to take them back and when I had bought them I payed $15 that was on a gift card and the rest in cash which was $80+. This was already way more money that I was expecting to pay which I also didn’t really have the money to pay that much but I did. So I took them back and got all of the money on gift cards which I didn’t need since the making of the shirts were poor quality. I asked them why this was and all they could say is it was there policy but didn’t tell me anything about it when I payed. I wanted the corporate number but I had already left so I called them and nobody answered it was just a automatic voice. So now I’m sitting here with $100+ dollars of gift cards that I don’t need when what I need is shirts to wear

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this experience to our attention! You can contact us at guestservices@spencersonline.com or 1-800-762-0419 for further assistance.

name: Angi Whatley
text:
My husband and I stopped by this store while we were in Huntsville for some new toys. The blonde sales lady that helped us was excellent. One of the toys we purchased malfunctioned that same evening. The store was closed the next day and we were traveling home (5 hours away) so I called the store on the following day to get a replacement. I left a message with my information. Never heard a word from the store. I called back and I was told I could bring the toy back and they would troubleshoot it and/or replace it. I explained that I live 5 hours away. The sales lady said she would have the manager call me back that same day. I haven’t heard a word from the manager and I am very disappointed in their customer service. I was originally told that the product I purchased had a year warranty and if I had any issue at all to let the store know. This toy was expensive! Buyer beware!!!

Update: the owner of Sultry reached out to me and was wonderful! My toy will be replaced and I am satisfied! This is a very nice store.

resp.text:
Hello Angi,
I’m so sorry you experienced any issues with covering the warranty under Sultry’s 30 days. We tried to follow up the day of (May 7th) but we were informed you were at a graduation and you would not be able to answer. Tiffany  contacted you the next day (May 8th) and left a message on your voicemail that we could ship out the replacement with no issues due to the distance.

I’m sorry there was a hiccup but we always try to make things right for our clients. If you would like to call and continue with the options we left on your voicemail we will gladly follow through with the warranty exchange.

Please contact Tiara to further assist 2568804884.

* Called and left a message today May 15th to provide more assistance.
Thank you

text: The staff are very knowledgeable and helpful! I found everything I was looking for and more. Great selection, even for a plus size girl like myself! Thanks Sultry!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Cheyenne. We at Sultry believe EveryBODY is sexy. Thank you for visiting Sultry Adult Boutique.  We look forward to seeing you again love.

name: Stephanie Woodlan
text: I visited Sultry on 2/15/2018.  Best customer service. Made me feel really comfortable.  Great lingerie and toys selection.  I found my new go to shop.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting Sultry Stephanie.  We are ecstatic to have you apart of our clientele.  See you again soon.

name: erika smalley
text: Owner is very helpful. Makes you feel very comfortable and like one of her best friends! I'll be back!

resp.text: Thank you dear! It was a great time! Thank you for letting me help you and thank you for letting me know what you would like to see more of in the store! That helps a great deal. SEE YOU AGAIN SOON.

name: Brad L.
text: An informative experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We are happy you enjoyed your visit. :)

name: Tori Trudeau
text: Sultry is the best place around with great prices. Sultry offers so much to include educational classes and I can't wait to attend tomorrow nights class.

name: Katie Sunshine
text: Tiara and her shop are both absolutely *amazing*! The shop has a good selection, and Tiara told us if we are interested in anything else, all we have to do is ask. For interested vegans, Sultry provides a nice selection of vegan-friendly products and gear. I love the convenience of having it "right next door" versus ordering online---and being able to see/touch items before buying is super awesome. We will definitely be back! :)

name: Tianna
text: Extremely helpful and very knowledgeable. Would recommend Sultry to anyone!

name: Amy Cockrell
text: Customer service is fantastic , staff is very helpful as knowledgeable and would recommend this to anyone !

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking time out of your busy schedule to write this review. At Sultry we pride ourselves on the customer experience.   Sexual wellness, education, a wide selection of enhancement products and discretion are paramount. Please let us  know how we can further your experiences.

name: Lindsey Smith
text: Great selection of products and the owners are very informative and helpful! Will be returning!

resp.text: Hey Lindsey, thank you for the kind review. It was a pleasure assisting you today and hope to see you again soon love. -Tiara

name: Laura Morgan
text: Very nice and great selections

resp.text: Thank You Tyler for your kind review. :)

name: Chloe Jayy
text: Great people great prices. 10/10 reccomend. Definitely stop by this place. They got everything you might need and it wont cost an arm and a leg.

text: Great service and the owner is doing what he can to help the community.
